document.heading: Verizon Center Sales Tax Revenue Bond Approval Act of 2007

history.narrative: Law 17-12, the “Verizon Center Sales Tax Revenue Bond Approval Act of 2007”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-117 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 3, 2007, and April 19, 2007, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 4, 2007, it was assigned Act No. 17-41 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-12 became effective on July 12, 2007.
